A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I enjoyed the movie with a few caveats.
Too many cutsie pie creatures added just to sell toys\, the side quest was a waste of time\, and the Mary Poppins flight looked terrible.
I personally think that hatred for this movie is from younger rabid fanboy types who weren't born when Star Wars was first released (and therefore enjoyed the copycat "Force Awakens") and have spent the last year living in their parents basements devoting all their time to theorizing origin stories. 
I was delighted that the silly fan theories were subverted. Just tell me a new story. I was pleased that Characters had evolved... it's been decades.
